properties.description: 17 – 21 John Street Winter ‘Livingroom’, will be open daily from January 2023, Monday to Friday 9.00am to 5.00pm, as a warm space for 16- to 25-year-olds. Lunch will be served at 1.00pm on Mon, Wed and Thursday. Tea, Coffee and Hot Chocolate will be available daily, and an activity programme will run, including Arts and crafts, pottery, sewing, cooking, and Movie afternoons. There is a computer and free internet access, and a pool table.
